Method Detail

shade

public void shade(CanvasPeer canvas,
                  RenderAtom atom,
                  Shader shader)
Description copied from interface: ShaderPeer
Take the shader assigned to the specified atom and setup the graphics environment so that it is correct. Do so by only updating where there is a change.

The whole atom is supplied here because there might be some shaders that need to access the geometry in order to shade properly.

Specified by:
shade in interface ShaderPeer
Parameters:
atom -

doneShading

public void doneShading(CanvasPeer canvas,
                        RenderAtom atom,
                        Shader shader)
Description copied from interface: ShaderPeer
This is called when we are about to change state from this shader. Normally this will not be necessry, as the new state will be set by the new shader of the same type. But in some cases there could be a need to change something back. This is especially true of user supplied shaders.

Specified by:
doneShading in interface ShaderPeer
Parameters:
canvas -
atom -
shader -
